headline: U.S. Senate candidate Dave McCormick to visit the Midstate
sentences: (WHTM) â€” Dave McCormick, who is running for United States Senate in Pennsylvania, continues his campaign in York and Lancaster on Monday, Feb. 28.
McCormick kicked off the day in York with a breakfast meet and greet at the Starlight Diner in Hanover before he tours a manufacturing business.
After, he will make his way to Lancaster where he will host a townhall with voters at the Spring House Brewing Company.
